aboutpara:
I am a Software Engineer with experience in web and mobile development, specializing in React, Django, and PostgreSQL. I have worked on several personal and collaborative projects on GitHub, contributing improvements and optimizations that demonstrate my ability to learn quickly and apply best development practices.

I am passionate about Cloud Computing and DevOps, and I continuously seek opportunities to integrate these skills into real world projects, learning new tools and methodologies to deliver efficient and scalable solutions.

My goal is to grow professionally in the IT field, contributing my software development experience and enthusiasm for cloud infrastructure, while participating in projects that challenge and expand my technical skills.

I am open to new professional opportunities, particularly roles involving software development, cloud, and DevOps. I look forward to connecting with professionals and teams with similar interests to collaborate and learn together.

resume.tagline: Software Engineer | Cloud & DevOps Enthusiast | Transforming Ideas Into Production-Ready Apps
resume.description: Well-versed with React, Javascript, and most of the Web frameworks. Passionate about Cloud Computing and DevOps

experiences.bullets: Repaired residential and commercial network systems, Ensuring optimal performance and connectivity. Diagnosed and resolved technical issues efficiently, Providing on-site support and excellent customer service. Collaborated with engineering and support teams to improve installation procedures and reduce service downtime.

Development of multiple websites related to law and real estate sales. Participate in and lead a high-performing development team, Fostering a collaborative and results-driven work environment. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure timely delivery of scalable and user-centric web solutions.
